comments:
I am using Eclipse RC2

Eclipse Platform

Version: 3.0.0
Build id: 200406111814


When I use Refactor/Move on classes, the package view is no longer updated (was
working up to RC1 I think).
- The classes do not appear in the new package.
- fixing compilation error in the editor does not update the red sign in the
package view.

I use the following plugins with Eclipse:
Checkstyle
Metrics (metrics.sf.net)

Daniel,

I checked this in various setups and it always worked for me. Some questions:

- do you have anything in the log file when this happens.
- can you provide steps to reproduce this.

This might be a dup a bug 63635 Decorations become stale and/or bug 66439 Copy 
of Class causes update error in package explorer.

It would be really helpful to get steps.

Dirk,

I checked the log and it looks like the metrics plugin was the reason of the
problem. I disabled the action of the module on the project and I have been able
to work without problem with the refactoring/move feature today.


I include here the Exceptions with the metrics plugin and some others related to
Eclipse itself just to be sure that the metrics plugin is the cause of the problem.

OK, thanks for the info. I will close the PR since the metrics plug-in isn't 
owned by Eclipse. Please report the bug to the owner of the metrics plug-in.
